result.name: crest
result.notes: Case management system for Crown court cases. Details include name, sex, date of birth and address of defendant, type of crime, personal details of victims, and details of third parties involved, details of judges, and solicitors involved if applicable. Dates and location of hearing, whether additional documents involved and recorded outcomes and adjournments.

organization.name: ministry-of-justice
organization.title: Ministry of Justice
organization.description:
We work to protect the public and reduce reoffending, and to provide a more effective, transparent and responsive criminal justice system for victims and the public.

MOJ is a ministerial department, supported by 37 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-justice
